__e: The only problem is... for the last, what, two or three years, it hasn't really been as good as it used to be.
Well, I just don't understand why we can't live together and things can be like they used to.
And all he wants to do is talk about the stuff we used to do.
They don't seem to have the murders these days like they used to.
Next door used to have one.
There seems to be a lot more younger people, who have access to a lot more tools than there used to be.
So all the men used to go down and hang around outside the hospital, waiting for the bits left over from the patients food.
